title: Personality Test
description: Answer 35 quick statements to assess your personality traits (Big Five).

landing.h2: Free personality test online – Big Five assessment
landing.p1: Take a free personality test with 35 concise statements measuring openness, conscientiousness, extraversion, agreeableness and neuroticism.
landing.p2: Keywords: free personality test, Big Five test, online personality test, 35 questions, traits, extraversion, openness, conscientiousness, agreeableness, neuroticism

q2.text: I feel at ease in groups.

q5.text: I like to draw attention to myself.

q8.text: I make people feel at ease.

q9.text: I take time out for others.

q10.text: I feel little concern for others.

q11.text: I am interested in solving problems.

q14.text: I am considerate and kind to almost everyone.

q18.text: I get chores done right away.

q20.text: I make a mess of things.

q31.text: I am quick to understand things.

q32.text: I am not interested in abstract ideas.

summary.title: Summary
summary.subtitle: Finish to view your detailed results.
summary.paywallText: Complete – unlock your results to view your personality breakdown.
